snippet.title: Adaptory trailer (Alpha 3)
snippet.description:
The second trailer for Adaptory, a base-building/survival game coming out in 2024. 

➡ Wishlist today on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2201620/Adaptory/
➡ Download Alpha 3 today: https://soundasleepful.itch.io/adaptory

Adaptory is a 2D base-building/survival game where you're looking after a crew of four characters who have crash landed on a procedurally generated planetoid in deep space. In order to survive, you're challenged to build a home and ultimately a community in this complex environment, and along the way learn more about the unique characters in your crew.

#gamedev #madewithspine #libgdx #indiedev 

https://adaptorygame.com
Art by Careously https://twitch.tv/careously
Music by Sai Natarajan https://www.viusstudios.com/
